Translations.Text: Those who are humble when making their contact prayer
And they abstain from vain talk
And they are active towards purification
And they keep covered their private parts
Except around their mates, or those who are maintained by their oaths, they are free from blame
But whoever seeks anything beyond this, then these are the transgressors
And those who look after what they have been entrusted to and to their pledges
And those who maintain their contact prayers
Theones who shall inherit the Paradise, in it they will abide
And We have created man from an extract from clay
Then We made him a seed in a safe lodging

Then We created the seed into an embryo, then We created the embryo into a fetus, then We created the fetus into bone, then We covered the bone with flesh, then We brought forth a new creation. So glory be to God, the best of creators
Then after that, you will die
Then you will be resurrected on the Day of Resurrection
AndWe have created above you seven paths; and We were never, with regards to the creation, unaware
